TopicTitle: Centre of lift orientation on part

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I have added a lift module to a part, and am wondering how I change the lift orientation and which node it is associated with. I have a part with 4 node connections that I would like to provide lift.  In the SPH the lift arrow icon only shows when the part is connected via the x axis. I would like it to show when connected with a different axis ( if possible)

Thanks for your help!

 

Spacetackle.
